data.text:
@jcgourc Greetings, we would like to recommend that you contact via email at contact@service.thaiairways.com and net.flightrsvn@thaiairways.com by informing the following information
1. Name-Surname (English)
2. Reservation Code 
3. Flights and travel dates
4. Intent
@berndlehmann15 Greetings, our domestic flight still proceeds normally. It will be transferred and operated by THAI Smile.
@alexj_t In this case, we suggest that you contact our THAI local offices near you for more information. You may find contact details at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR
@alexj_t Do you book or trave by THAI flights? Are those flight canceled?

@Stefan_baisden We would like to inform you that the refund is in accordance with the process. If there are any updates or progress towards this issue, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible. Once we do apology for the inconvenience.
@alexj_t Greetings, now we have promotion for extended miles for more information click https://t.co/Wa5I3OeS2o .
@Stefan_baisden May we inquire which email you have contact with?
@Stefan_baisden Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@Daniele58434853 Greetings, could you please provide your current city?

data.text: @ASarjam We suggest that you delete your personal information for security reasons and send us via inbox instead so we can keep you posted. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
